author: goldenlabubuwatch @pandawatch88
text:
Kathy just moved Bytedance valuation from usd330bn in the last employee buyback round to usd480bn buying a usd300m secondary stake.

Management will be upset. Buybacks just got more expensive.

The other person upset will be uncle Liu, treachery afoot (find Kathy right there in JD IR homepage, she shall be deleted promptly).

Bytedance at c.3.5x P/S still a steal. Tencent is at 7.5x.
